title: Bronze platebody

properties.name: description
properties.value: A bronze platebody is the weakest of all platebodies. It has no requirement to equip and provides a greater Defence bonus than a bronze chainbody. Like all platebodies, however, it gives a crippling penalty to the user's Ranged and Magic stats. It is recommended that players training either of those skills instead use robes or even no armour at all.

Item ID1117

A bronze platebody is the weakest of all platebodies. It has no requirement to equip and provides a greater Defence bonus than a bronze chainbody. Like all platebodies, however, it gives a crippling penalty to the user's Ranged and Magic stats. It is recommended that players training either of those skills instead use robes or even no armour at all.

Players can smith them from 5 bronze bars if they have at least level 18 Smithing. Doing so will yield 62.5 Smithing experience. They can be bought from Horvik's Smithy or Zenesha's Plate Mail Body Shop.

 Attack bonuses

 Defence bonuses
